CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;George Nicolaou;Giorgio Malinverni;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in LOC , a town in LOC .

CARDINAL . The applicant lives in a municipally maintained flat . She sued the local council ’s planning department and a municipal maintenance company for overdue repairs . On DATE the Petropavlovsk - Kamchatskiy Town Court awarded the applicant MONEY ( RUB ) by way of damages and costs , and in addition ordered the defendants to
“ eliminate the cause of the leak in [ the applicant ’s flat ] in DATE by way of reconstructive repairs of the end wall and roof according to the estimate for selective repairs of the house . ”
This judgment became binding on DATE , but was not enforced immediately .

CARDINAL . On DATE bailiffs closed enforcement proceedings against the planning department , because in the meantime it had been disbanded . On DATE the bailiffs closed enforcement proceedings against the maintenance company because of its insolvency . The writ of enforcement was passed to ORG .
CARDINAL . From DATE to DATE the applicant received CARDINAL payments totalling RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant ’s roof was repaired .
CARDINAL . In separate proceedings in DATE the applicant brought unsuccessful civil claims against the Petropavlovsk - Kamchatsk ORG . These proceedings ended with the judgment of ORG of DATE .
CARDINAL . Under LAW of DATE , a bailiff must enforce a judgment within DATE .
